titleStmt.title: By the Lords and other His Majesties commissioners an order for the observance and execution of the statute made for the reliefe and ordering of persons infected with the plague.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: Ed. Littleton C.S. Cottington. Hertford. Dorchester. Dorset. Hen. Dover. Chichester. F. Seymour. Edw. Nicholas.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
